author: Luc Olinga
title: The $50 Billion Company That Does Almost Nothing
description: Wall Street is valuing crypto firm Circle like the next big thing in tech. Its entire business? Holding your dollars and keeping the interest.
content: Something strange is happening on Wall Street. It isn’t Elon Musk, AI, or a late-night post from Donald Trump. It’s a crypto company called Circle Internet Group, and its making the market feel like … [+3234 chars]
reworded_title:
What you need to know: This week on The Daily Show, host Jon Stewart revealed that the New York Times has been selling it to Goldman Sachs.

reworded_description:
For more on this topic, check out this new post by the author of "The Value of Crypto"

Wall Street is valuing crypto firm Circle like the next big thing in tech. Its entire business? Holding your dollars and keeping the interest. Crypto is the future.

This is one of those posts that you don't have to read every day. It's just a guide that shows you how to get started with crypto and it makes you feel like you're part of
reworded_content:
The company is actually doing a lot of stuff that we don't know about, and it's doing it for a very good reason. It was a really good idea, and we just started talking about it.

And then Elon Musk was like, "Well, it's really cool that we're making a small company that's doing things that we don't know about, and that's a good start."
